channel.title: Java . lang error - solved
channel.description: i got a error in runserver.bat when i started about java.lang... and i forget how to fix.. any 1 help?

item.title: Java . lang error - solved
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

i found it… now if u were working in auto spawn like me
when u have this

spawn = 86 2889 9910 0 0 0 0 0 1 rat

all numbers have to have 1 space… so when u hit the right key it doesnt go 1 by 1 till there its just 1jump

i had to search all things it was here!
spawn = 86 2889 9910 0 0 0 0 0 1 rat
where the ! is

Read full topic

item.title: Java . lang error - solved
item.dc:creator: @peterd peterd
item.description:
@peterd wrote:

I have a problem similar to that. Mine says

Server is already in use.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “1
4151 1 1”

            at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString<Unknown Source>
            at java.lang.Interger.parseInt<Unknown Source>
            at java.lang.Interger.parseInt<Unknown Source>
            at NPCHandler.loadNPCdrops<NPCHandler.java:2043
            at NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:547
            at server.main<server.java:110>

Any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2009, 12:06:01 pm[/size][hr]

Read full topic

item.title: Java . lang error - solved
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string:“0”

   at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unkown source)
   at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unkown Source)
   at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unkown Source)
   at NPCHandler.LoadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2508
   at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:24)
   at server.man(server.java:27)
